description:
This online autism course aims to raise awareness of the Autism Spectrum and introduces the learner to some positive strategies to support those on the spectrum.

This course will provide a comprehensive introduction to the autism spectrum. Recognising and understanding the key areas of difficulty experienced by individuals on the autism spectrum is vital to providing effective support.

This course is suitable for anyone wanting to develop a general awareness and understanding of autism. It is relevant for both those who support children or adults on the autism spectrum.

Please Visit our Fan Page here: https://www.facebook.com/autismhopeproject
title: Understanding and Treating Autism
